maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/202/sett.orig: \c[3]Defend the transport for 2 minutes\c[0] until it is repaired!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/202/sett.text: \c[3]Défendez le transporteur pendant 2 minutes\c[0], jusqu'à ce qu'il soit réparé !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/204/sett.orig:
\c[1]QUEST FAILED\c[0]

Restart task to try again
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/204/sett.text:
\c[1]QUÊTE ÉCHOUÉE\c[0]

Redémarrez la quête pour réessayer.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/205/sett.orig: Yes, cargo saved, \v[lore.title.shad] saved, day saved!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/205/sett.text: Oui, cargo sauvé, \v[lore.title.shad]s sauvés, jour sauvé !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/205/sett.orig: Now travel continue.\. Hopefully uneventful.\. Boss already angry as is, I wager.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/205/sett.text: Maintenant continuer voyage.\. Espérer calme.\. Patron déjà énervé, moi imaginer.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/205/sett.orig: We, hurry then!\. Boss rage scary!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/205/sett.text: Nous devoir se dépêcher ! Patron surement fou de rage !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/205/sett.orig: Thank you and goodbye, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Talk to boss in town for reward.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/205/sett.text: Merci et au revoir, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Parler au boss au village pour récompense.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/208/sett.orig: I don't like the sand.\. Such coarse, rough... and full of biting bones!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/208/sett.text: Moi pas aimer sable.\. Lui gros et rugueux... et plein d'os qui mordent !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/208/sett.orig: Please find items quickly, so we can return to town!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/208/sett.text: Trouver objets rapidement, pour que nous pouvoir retourner au village !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Quo'wark
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Quo'wark

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Dia'strez
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Dia'strez

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Hi!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Salut !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Ah, please no eat scaly Shad.\.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Ah, pitié, pas manger Shad plein d'écailles.\.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Oh dummy!\. Open eyes, it not a monster.\. It human!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Idiot !\. Ouvrir yeux, ça pas monstre.\. Ça humain !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Oh.\. Yes, that true.\. Such danger here, not good for Shad nerves.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Oh.\. Oui, toi raison.\. Trop de danger ici, mauvais pour nerfs des Shads.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Ignore big baby.\. Is human here to help?\. Us could need help with great problem.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Ignorer grand bébé.\. Humain ici pour aider ?\. Nous besoin d'aide avec grand problème.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Sent by Bazaarboss itself?\. Such kindness, he thinking of workers!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Envoyé par patron du bazar ?\. Gentil de sa part, de penser à nous travailleurs !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: He more think of precious cargo, me think.\. No matter, help is help!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Lui penser plus à cargo précieux, moi penser.\. Mais aide bienvenue quand même !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], look at transportation platform behind us.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], regarder plateforme de transport derrière nous.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Quo'wark
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Quo'wark

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Dia'strez
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Dia'strez

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: It fine human technology, helped us move much crates.\. But now it broke.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Ça bonne technologie humaine, aide à transporter beaucoup caisse.\. Mais maintenant cassé.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Yes, shield still work, so no monsters eat precious cargo.\. But floaty device not work anymore.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Oui, bouclier fonctionne encore, donc monstres pas manger précieux cargo.\. Mais appareil flottaison plus marcher.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Meaning we stuck like rock.\. And need materials for repair. Like \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0] from city.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Du coup nous coincés comme rocher.\. Et besoin matériel pour réparer. Comme \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0] du village.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Also \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0]!\. And \c[3]\v[item.177.name]\c[0]!\. Both found in desert, if hit plants!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Aussi \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0] !\. Et \c[3]\v[item.177.name]\c[0] !\. Trouver eux dans désert, quand toi frapper plantes !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Yes, but different plants, not forget!\. And that it.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Oui, mais plantes différentes, pas oublier !\. Ça est tout.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Quo'wark
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Quo'wark

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Dia'strez
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Dia'strez

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Human understand and bring materials?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Humain compris et apporter matériel ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Good news!\. Please hurry and help us move again.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Bonne nouvelle !\. S'il vous plait, vous devoir dépêcher pour aider nous à continuer.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Yes, we wait and guard crate.\. And try not be eaten.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Oui, nous attendre et surveiller caisse.\. Et essayer pas être mangés.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.orig: Bye!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/228/sett.text: Bye !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.orig: You got needed materials?\. It splendid!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.text: Toi avoir matériel nous besoin ?\. Ça splendide !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.orig: Yes!\. It splendid!\. Now we can do repairs and leave sandy sharkplace!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.text: Oui !\. Ça splendide !\. Maintenant nous pouvoir réparer et partir de endroit plein de sable et requins !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.orig: Yes, but there one problem.\. To repair engine, platform needs restart.\. Including shield.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.text: Oui, mais reste problème.\. Pour réparer moteur, doit redémarrer plateforme.\. Bouclier compris.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.orig: Oh no.\. Then monsters can attack precious cargo!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.text: Oh non.\. Alors monstre peut attaquer précieux cargo !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker] we need more help.\. Please also protect transport for time needed to restart.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], nous besoin encore aide.\. S'il vous plait, devoir protéger transport pendant temps nécessaire pour redémarrer.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.orig: Yes, yes.\. Please help.\. It only around 2 minutes!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.text: Oui, oui.\. Aider s'il vous plait.\. Ça prendre que 2 minutes !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.orig: Good, good!\. Please prepare for protection and talk again, when ready!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/229/sett.text: Bien, bien !\. Vous préparer pour protéger. Parler à nous quand vous prêt !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/230/sett.orig: Good, we starting repairs then.\. Please protect crate till shield is back!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/230/sett.text: Bien, nous commencer réparations alors.\. Vous protéger nous jusqu'à que bouclier revienne !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/230/sett.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker] be ready!\. Angry bone creatures come near!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/230/sett.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] être prêt !\. Créatures d'os enragés arrivent !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/230/sett.orig: Fine, come back when ready.\. Please return soon!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/230/sett.text: Bon, revenir quand prêt.\. Bientôt s'il vous plaît !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/230/sett.orig: Yes, please not leave \v[lore.title.shad] in coarse sand much longer.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/230/sett.text: Oui, s'il vous plaît, pas laisser \v[lore.title.shad] dans sable rugueux trop longtemps.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/231/sett.orig: Human please bring \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0] from town market!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/231/sett.text: Humain, s'il te plaît, apporter nous \c[3]\v[item.190.name]\c[0] depuis marché du village !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/231/sett.orig: Also \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0]!\. And \c[3]\v[item.177.name]\c[0] from plants in this desert!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/231/sett.text: Aussi \c[3]\v[item.186.name]\c[0] !\. Et \c[3]\v[item.177.name]\c[0] depuis plantes dans désert ici.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/235/sett.orig: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], defend us from mean sharks!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/235/sett.text: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], défendre nous contre méchants requins !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/235/sett.orig: Boss be angry when he sees damage...
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/235/sett.text: Patron être furieux quand lui verra dégâts.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/235/sett.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker], crate get unstable!\. No more hit, please!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/235/sett.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], caisse instable !\. Plus de coup, pitié

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/235/sett.orig: Use body to protect, if must!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/235/sett.text: Utiliser corps pour protéger, si besoin !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/237/sett.orig: Whoa...\. you can actually walk through here?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/237/sett.text: Wouah...\. On peut vraiment passer par là ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.orig: I see you arrived in \c[3]Barren Arcs\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.text: Je vois que tu es arrivé aux \c[3]Arches Perdues\c[0] !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.orig: We'll need to meet at a certain spot...\. hm...\. how to describe it...
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.text: Il faut que l'on se rencontre à un certain endroit...\. hum...\. comment le décrire...

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.orig: Okay, first look for a \c[3]lonely pillar\c[0] in a \c[3]nearby chasm\c[0]...
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.text: OK, d'abord, cherche un \c[3]pilier solitaire\c[0] dans un \c[3]fossé pas loin\c[0].

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.orig: From there, just head \c[3]straight to the south\c[0]!
Oh... and also please make sure you are \c[3]by yourself\c[0].
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.text: Oh... et assure-toi que tu arrives bien \c[3]toute seule\c[0].

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.orig: We need to keep this confidential!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.text: Il faut qu'on garde ça pour nous !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.orig: Lea, again, are you really sure about this?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/238/sett.text: Lea, encore une fois, tu es vraiment sûre de vouloir faire ça ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/240/sett.text: OK...\. tu as trouvé le \c[3]pilier solitaire\c[0].

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/240/sett.orig: Now just head \c[3]straight to the south\c[0]!

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/241/sett.orig: Just keep running at this wall to \c[3]east\c[0].
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/241/sett.text: Continue de courir sur ce mur à l'\c[3]est\c[0].

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/241/sett.orig: Once you do that, I'll give you instructions to find exactly the \c[3]right spot\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/241/sett.text: Quand tu commenceras, je te dirais quoi faire pour trouver exactement la \c[3]bonne position\c[0] !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/241/sett.orig: From here keep running at the wall to \c[3]south\c[0].
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/241/sett.text: De là, continue de courir contre le mur vers le \c[3]sud\c[0].

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/241/sett.orig: I'll again give you instructions to find the \c[3]right spot\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/241/sett.text: Je vais continuer à te dire quoi faire pour trouver exactement la \c[3]bonne position\c[0] !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Lea... you need to \c[3]disband your party\c[0].
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Lea... il faut que tu \c[3]fasses partir les personnes de ton groupe\c[0]

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: We shouldn't risk to have more players involved in this.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: On ne peut pas prendre le risque d'impliquer d'autres joueurs là-dedans.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: There you are!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Ah te voilà !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Hi?!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Salut ?!

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Ha...\. you look confused.\. That makes sense.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Ha...\. T'as l'air d'être sur le cul.\. C'est normal.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: You don't see avatars like mine around here that often, do you?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: T'en vois pas beaucoup d'avatars comme le mien, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: How?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Comment ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Well...\. there are some tricks you can use to get an avatar like this.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Ben...\. Il y a des astuces que l'on peut utiliser pour avoir un avatar comme ça.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Though this isn't exactly allowed.\. Which is why I can't just walk around all willy-nilly!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Mais c'est pas vraiment autorisé.\. C'est pour ça que je peux pas me permettre de me balader partout comme ça !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Why?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Huh?\. Why am I using this Avatar then?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Hein ?\. Pourquoi j'utilise cet Avatar alors ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Well...\. it's cute, don't you think?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Ben...\. il est trop mignon, tu trouves pas ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Also it will be helpful for what we're about to do.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Et sinon on va en avoir besoin pour ce que l'on va faire.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: There is a reason they don't want modded avatars like this.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Il y a une raison pour laquelle ils ne veulent pas d'avatars modés comme celui-là.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: The game tends to glitch...\. just a little bit easier!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Le jeu a tendance à glitcher...\. un peu plus facilement !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Oh yeah, I probably should explain what we're doing today!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Bon oui, je devrais peut-être t'expliquer ce qu'on va faire maintenant !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: We'll explore some \c[3]new and unknown territory\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: On va explorer des \c[3]nouveaux territoires inconnus\c[0] !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: In fact, I understand it's a little testing area for developers that has been left in the Playground.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Quelqu'un m'a dit qu'il y a un petit terrain de test pour les développeurs qui a été laissé sur le Terrain de Jeu.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: And it's supposed to be quite the experience!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Et on m'a dit qu'il devait valloir le coup !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: We'll just have to do a few things...\. very precisely...\. to get there.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Il va juste falloir que l'on fasse certaines choses...\. avec précision...\. pour y arriver.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: This way!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Par là !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: I'll need you to run against this wall here. To the \c[3]east\c[0].
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Je vais avoir besoin que tu coures contre ce mur-là. Vers l'\c[3]est\c[0].

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: But you'll have to run at just the \c[3]right spot\c[0].
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Mais tu devras courir en étant \c[3]exactement à la bonne position\c[0].

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: I suggest you just keep running against this wall and I'll give more detailed instructions for your position!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Je suggère que tu continues de courir contre le mur pendant que je te donne des instructions détaillées sur comment te placer !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: [nods]
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.orig: Are you...\. about to use that glitch?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/243/sett.text: Tu vas...\. essayer d'utiliser ce glitch ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/244/sett.orig: No, wait! Your position is \c[3]wrong again\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/244/sett.text: Non, stop ! Ta position est \c[3]encore mauvaise\c[0] !
Juste un \c[1]petit peu plus\c[0] vers le \c[3]sud\c[0]...

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/244/sett.orig: \c[2]That's it\c[0]! Just \c[3]keep running\c[0] at this point!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/244/sett.text: \c[2]Voilà\c[0] ! Maintenant \c[3]continue de courir\c[0] sur cette position !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/244/sett.orig: You need to \c[3]keep running\c[0] against the wall, Lea!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/244/sett.text: Il faut que tu \c[3]continues de courir\c[0] contre le mur, Lea !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: Nice!\. That worked faster than I expected!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Super !\. C'était plus rapide que ce que je pensais !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: Hahaha, I suppose that was your first \c[3]wall phasing glitch\c[0].
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Hahaha, j'imagine que c'est la première fois que tu \c[3]glitches à travers un mur\c[0] !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: In case you are wondering...\. it's due to a little workaround they added in the early days.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Au cas où tu te demanderais...\. c'est lié à un petit contournement qu'ils ont ajouté au tout début...

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: Well...\. back then players sometimes got stuck in arbitrary locations.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Bien...\. à l'époque, les joueurs restaient parfois coincés un peu arbitrairement.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: The workaround would just slightly teleport them forward if they were stuck for too long.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Le contournement, c'était de les faire se téléporter un peu en avant s'ils restaient coincés trop longtemps.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: And it seems they never managed to fix the bug entirely!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Et on dirait qu'ils n'ont jamais réussi à corriger entièrement le problème !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: Yes, yes.\. It is really complicated, you see?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Oui, oui.\. C'est que c'est pas facile, tu sais ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: Sometimes you still see other players just running against walls, right?
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Parfois on voit encore des joueurs qui courent contre des murs, non ?

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: And that's why the workaround is still active, it's just much harder to trigger than it used to be.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: C'est pour ça que le contournement est encore actif, il est juste plus difficile à déclencher qu'avant.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: Well it should be!\. We tried really hard to make it impossible to abuse.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Et c'est parfaitement voulu ! On a vraiment tout fait pour que plus personne ne puisse plus en abuser.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: It's actually close to impossible to trigger it on your own.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: C'est en fait presque impossible de le déclencher en étant seul.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: Of course, we never considered multiple players would cooperate to make it work.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Bien entendu, il nous serait jamais venu à l'esprit que plusieurs joueurs puissent collaborer entre eux pour y arriver.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: From here we need to move to the \c[3]south\c[0]!\. You go first again.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: De là il faut qu'on aille au \c[3]sud\c[0] !\. Tu passes encore en première.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.orig: Seriously Lea!\. We might really get into trouble if anyone spots you doing this!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/252/sett.text: Sérieusement Lea !\. On risque de gros ennuis si quelqu'un te voit faire ça !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/253/sett.orig: No, wait! Your position is \c[3]wrong again\c[0]!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/253/sett.text: Non, stop ! Ta position est \c[3]encore mauvaise\c[0] !
Juste un \c[1]petit peu plus\c[0] vers l'\c[3]est\c[0]...
Juste un \c[1]petit peu plus\c[0] vers l'\c[3]ouest\c[0]...

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/253/sett.orig: \c[2]That's it\c[0]! Just \c[3]keep running\c[0] at this point!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/253/sett.text: \c[2]Voilà\c[0] ! Maintenant \c[3]continue de courir\c[0] sur cette position !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/253/sett.orig: You need to \c[3]keep running\c[0] against the wall, Lea!
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/253/sett.text: Il faut que tu \c[3]continues de courir\c[0] contre le mur, Lea !

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/255/sett.orig: Do not drag other players into that testing area.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/255/sett.text: Tu dois pas amener d'autres joueurs dans cet endroit.

maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/255/sett.orig: It is bad enough that you are walking around in it.
maps/heat/path-05.json/entities/255/sett.text: Le fait que tu y ailles c'est déjà suffisamment mauvais comme ça.
